author: crossley
msg: Fix the "release-dist" build target to build both packages on the same system using Ant fixcrlf.
We used to build the *.tar.gz on a UNIX system and *.zip on a Windows system,
which relied on SVN to get the line-endings right. Nice but required two people to build the release.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o rollback to 2.0.6-s, as the release failed

author: wrowe
msg: In order to add EPSV, it makes sense to refactor PASV handling into args and
presentation v.s. the actual passive bind.

author: ngallardo
msg: A utility for reading in the handler xml via JAXB.
